round_best: Develop a hybrid segmentation model that combines the strengths of SAM with a dynamic transformer architecture designed to enhance semantic understanding. The transformer layer will adaptively assign attention weights based on the semantic context of each patch, effectively handling a vast array of semantic classes by learning context-dependent relationships between them. This approach should reduce the confusion between similar classes and improve the granularity of segmentation in complex scenes.
